com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.tick

Class TickHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.tick.TickHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    @Singleton
public class TickHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler
    The TickHandler handles the ticking of all Tickables on the server. However not every Tickable is registered here. Phases and Features receive their ticks from the Game instance
    Every server mod has it's own implementation of the TickHandler

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Called when the underlying server mod calls a tick. Causes all Tickables to tick

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Starts the ticker
        Specified by:
        enable in interface Handler

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Stops every Tickable from ticking and does some cleanup
        Specified by:
        disable in interface Handler

      • registerTickable

        public void registerTickable(@Nonnull
                             Tickable tickable)
        Registers a new Tickable. Calls the Tickable.enable() method.
        Parameters:
        tickable - the new Tickable that should now receive server ticks

      • end

        public void end(@Nonnull
                Tickable tickable)
        Remove the tickable form the tickloop
        Parameters:
        tickable - the tickable which should no longer receive ticks
